message: The REL_CAL_POLICY field for indicator 3-d-1, translated into all languages

data.en:
Results of the IHR Annual Report 2020 will be published no later than May 2021 at: https://extranet.who.int/e-spar and disseminated to other WHO homepages at WHO Website (www.who.int), such as the Strategic Partnership for

Health Security and Emergency Preparedness (SPH) Portal (https://extranet.who.int/sph/ ),

the Global Health Observatory (https://www.who.int/data/gho ), WHO GPW13 triple billion targets dashboard (https://portal.who.int/triplebillions/ ).
data.fr:
Publication des données :

La publication de toutes les données est assurée chaque année vers le mois d'avril, juste avant l'Assemblée mondiale de la santé.
data.ru:
Выпуск данных:

Выпуск всех данных производится ежегодно примерно в апреле, незадолго до Всемирной ассамблеи здравоохранения
